def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    prices = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    print(sum(prices[:k]))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

# input
N, K = map(int, input().split())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

# sort
p.sort()

# output
print(sum(p[:K]))


def main():
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    prices = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    print(sum(prices[:k])) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import math


# 入力
N, K = map(int, input().split())  # N: 数列の長さ, K: 何番目までの和を求めるか
p = list(map(int, input().split()))  # p: 数列

# 数列を昇順にソート
p.sort()

# output
print(sum(p[:K]))
